# Extendicare## LTC / Multi Auditing Frequency### Hand Hygiene**NOTE:**
- Audits are to be rotated across all shifts. - During an outbreak, audits should focus on affected home areas. - Multis – audits should be completed as per frequency in each LTCH and Retirement home exclusively.
